bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Letter from Sue [s.n.] to Philip Showalter Hench, October 17, 1940

div1.p: Sue sends Hench her congratulations and says she will attend the Washington and Jefferson College exercises.

div1.head: Letter from Sue [s.n.] to Philip Showalter Hench, October 17, 1940
div1.opener:
Ac
Lm
October
Sevententh
SOE
Dear Phil-
div1.p:
We were very “tickled”
with the announcement
of your honor come
Saturday and are
planning to attend
the ten o'clock exercises.
Congratulations, PiTT
and “ME” are proud
of you.

Frank & I would
like Mary and you to
come in while you
are here and if you
can arrange to have
a dinner with us, by
all means save the
date for us and let
us know your wishes
as to day and hour.

Love to you & Mary
from both of us.
